titleStmt.title: [Chronicon Carionis] [...] Pars Chronici Carionis Latine Expositi Et Aucti multis et veteribus et recentibus Historijs, in narrationibus rerum Graecarum, Germanicarum et Ecclesiasticarum : Cui accessit locupletissimus rerum ac verborum memorabilium Index. - Wittebergae : Haeredes Georgij Rhau excudebant, 1561. - Secunda Pars: [...] ab Augusto Caesare usque ad Carolum Magnum. 1561.
Melanchthon, Philipp: Chronicon Carionis. Secunda pars, liber tertius. - Wittenberg, 1561.
Machine-readable text
titleStmt.author: Melanchthon, Philipp

change.item: typed text (the index only) - structural tagging completed - no semantic tagging - spell check partially performed - no orthographical standardization

titlePage.titlePart:
SECVNDA PARS CHRONICI CARIONIS AB AVGVSTO CAESARE VSQVE AD CAROLVM MAGNVM EXPOSITA ET AVCTA A PHILIPPO MENTHONE. Cum locupletissimo rerum ac verborum memorabilium Indice.
VVITEBERGAE Cum Gratia et Priuilegio. ANNO M. D. LXI.

div1.head: INDEX RERVM ET VERBORVM SECVNDAE partis Chronici.

div2.head: A
div2.p: Aelia in ruinis Ierosolymae aedificata 27. a
Ambrosius Episcop. Mediol: 93. b 94. a 99. a 100. b 102. b
Anthemius tutor Theodosij II. 109. a 109 b
Antonia filia Ammonij uxor Drusi 11. b
Arij reuocatio ab exilio 80. b 76. b
Athanasius in Exilio 77. b. 18. b. 181. a

div2.head: B
div2.p: Bellisarij uirtus et res gestae 146. a
Bellisarij uirtus 137. b fortuna 142. a. 146. a
Bizantium obsessum a Seuero triennium 35. b

div2.head: C
div2.p: Caganus Rex Hunnorum et Auarum 156. b 165. b
Caroli Martelli uirtus et res gestae 185. a
Caroli Mart: sepultura et Epitaphium 186. a
Christianorum persecutio IIII. sub Diocletiano 63. b
Coronatio Imperatorum a Patriarchis 130. b 143. b
Coronatio prima Imperatoris a Pontifice Romano 145. a
Crispus a patre Constantino interfectus 77. b

div2.head: D
div2.p: Danielis prophetia de Messia 7. b 8. a
Dani: uaticinium de regno Sarracenico 175. a
Domitius Nero pater Neronis Imperatoris 16. a
Dotrula sueuus unus ex 30. ducibus 155. a

div2.head: E
div2.p: Eudoxia II. et III. Roma abductae per Gensericum 112. b
Eucherius cum patre Stillicone interfectus 108. a

div2.head: F
div2.p: Fames Asiae et Europae 9. b 12. b
Feroaldus unus ex triginta Tyrannis 155. a
Franci eorumque uirtus 50. b 79. b 80. a 91. b

div2.head: G
div2.p: Genealogia Alexandri Seueri et Heliogabali 41. a
Gordianus I. pater et II. filius oppressi a Capelliano duce 144. b 145. a
Gregorius I. Episcopus Rom: 190. b 155. b 156. a
Gregorius II. et III. Rom: Episc: 163. b 186. a

div2.head: H
div2.p: Hildericus V. Rex Vandalorum 101. a 129. b
Honorij origo et Genealogia 97. a 105. b
Humanae hostiae mactatae a Iuliano 87. a

div2.head: I
div2.p: Iacobus interfectus ab Herode Agryppa 13. a
Ignis arte sub aqua factus ad comburendas naues 180. a 143. b
Iohannes Euangelista superstes tempore Domitiani ibidem
Iudaea in formam prouinciae redacta 3. b
Iulia uxor Seueri nupta postea priuigno Bassiano 36. a 39. a
Ius recte scriptum et certum esse debet ibid.

div2.head: L.
div2.p: Letus praefectus praetorio 32. b 34. a 35. a
Longobardorum Regum series in Italia 154. a

div2.head: M
div2.p: Martinus Episcopus Turonensis 94. b 102. b 179. a

div2.head: N
div2.p: Narbona deleta a Carolo Martello 184. a
Naturae humanae in Christo testimonia 126. a
Natura humana mortua in Christo 126. b

div2.head: O.
div2.p: Ottonis Vitellij et Galbae bella ciuilia 16. a, 16 b

div2.head: P.
div2.p: Pauli conuersio et peregrinatio 9. a 9 b10. a
Pipinus factus est Rex Francorum 17. a
Placida Galla desponsata Adaulto cognato Alarici 105. 108. a
Pulcheria Soror Theodosij II. 109. b 105. b

div2.head: Q.
div2.p: Quartae Monarchiae initium ab Augusto 1. b

div2.head: R.
div2.p: Romani caesi in Germania 3. a 6. b
Roma tertio capta ab Odoacro 130. a
Roma capta a Totila secundo 140. b

div2.head: S.
div2.p: Saxones, Sacae 91. b 92. a 147. a 155. a
Synodus Sardicensis 81. a 101. a 86. b 99. a
Synodus VI. oi)konomenikh\ Byzantina 180. a 190. b 192. b
Synodus Nicena alitera oi)konomenikh\ septima 101. a 189. b 72. b

div2.head: T
div2.p: Testimonia humanae naturae in Christo 12. a 12 b.

div2.head: Z
div2.closer: FINIS. *do/ca tw=| *qew=|. VVITEBERGAE EXCVDEBANT HAEREDES Georgij Rhau.
